__TOC__

This page contains a list of wiki banners which are currently being developed.

When you add a banner to a page, you should provide a comment directly below the banner briefly explaining the reason for adding it to the page. You should also write a relevant comment about the addition of the banner in the box marked ''Optional comment about this change'', directly below the main page-editing box.

=== Unsupported Version ===

==== Usage ====

* Pages which provide instructions __exclusively__ for unsupported versions of Ubuntu.
* Import this code in page:
 <pre>
<nowiki>[[Include(DocumentationTeam/WikiBanners/UnsupportedVersion)]]</nowiki>
</pre>
==== Example ====

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="height:32px;width: 80%; background:#FF9EDB; margin-left: 10%; margin-right: 10%; float: center; text-align:center;" style="border:none; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=unsupported-release-left.png); background-position:left; width:13px;">
| <style="border:none;  width=100%;">'''Unsupported Version:''' This article applies to an unsupported version of Ubuntu.
| <style="border:none; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=unsupported-release-right.png); background-repeat:no-repeat; background-position:right; width:13px;">
|}

=== Content cleanup required ===

==== Usage ====

* Pages which do not follow the content guidelines set out in the wiki guide. For example:
** Pages with poor spelling, punctuation and/or grammar.
** Pages with confusing or inadequate structure.
** Pages which are 'over-structured' (i.e. too many short sections)
* Import this code in page:
 <pre>
<nowiki>[[Include(DocumentationTeam/WikiBanners/ContentCleanUp)]]</nowiki>
</pre>
==== Example ====

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="height:32px;width: 80%; background:#A0B8E2; margin-left: 10%; margin-right: 10%; float: center; text-align:center;" style="border:none; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=content-clean-up-left.png); background-position:left; width:13px;">
| <style="border:none;  width=100%;">'''Content Cleanup Required:''' This article should be cleaned-up to follow the content standards in the Wiki Guide.
| <style="border:none; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=content-clean-up-right.png); background-repeat:no-repeat; background-position:right; width:13px;">
|}

=== Style cleanup required ===

==== Usage ====

* Pages which use non-standard styles. Standard styles are dictated by the Ubuntu Style Guide and Wiki Guide.
* Pages which use inappropriate or excessive formatting.
* Import this code in page:
 <pre>
<nowiki>[[Include(DocumentationTeam/WikiBanners/StyleCleanUp)]]</nowiki>
</pre>
==== Example ====

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="height:32px;width: 80%; background:#AFE2A0; margin-left: 10%; margin-right: 10%; float: center; text-align:center;" style="border:none; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=style-clean-up-left.png); background-position:left; width:13px;">
| <style="border:none;  width=100%;">'''Style Cleanup Required:''' This article does not follow the style standards in the Wiki Guide.
| <style="border:none; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=style-clean-up-right.png); background-repeat:no-repeat; background-position:right; width:13px;">
|}

=== Needs Expansion ===

==== Usage ====

* Pages which do not provide sufficient detail on the subject which they are supposed to cover.
* Pages which are unfinished.
* Import this code in page:
 <pre>
<nowiki>[[Include(DocumentationTeam/WikiBanners/NeedsExpansion)]]</nowiki>
</pre>
==== Example ====

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="height:32px;width: 80%; background:#F5E627; margin-left: 10%; margin-right: 10%; float: center; text-align:center;" style="border:none; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=needs-expansion-left.png); background-position:left; width:13px;">
| <style="border:none;  width=100%;"> '''Needs Expansion:''' This article is incomplete, and needs to be expanded.
| <style="border:none; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=needs-expansion-right.png); background-repeat:no-repeat; background-position:right; width:13px;">
|}

=== Page too long ===

==== Usage ====

* Pages which are too long.
* Pages which should be split up into sub-articles to help improve navigation.
* Import this code in page:
 <pre>
<nowiki>[[Include(DocumentationTeam/WikiBanners/PageTooLong)]]</nowiki>
</pre>
==== Example ====
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="height:32px;width: 80%; background: gray; margin-left: 10%; margin-right: 10%; float: center; text-align:center;" style="border:none; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=page-too-long-left.png); background-position:left; width:13px;">
| <style="border:none;  width=100%;"> '''Page too long:''' This article is too long, and should be split into sub-articles.
| <style="border:none; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=page-too-long-right.png); background-repeat:no-repeat; background-position:right; width:13px;">
|}

=== Candidate for moving ===

==== Usage ====

* Pages which cover subjects which are inappropriate for the Help wiki, but are appropriate for the Team wiki. These might include:
** Personal pages.
** Planning or development information.
** Blueprints.
* Import this code in page:
 <pre>
<nowiki>[[Include(DocumentationTeam/WikiBanners/CandidateForMoving)]]</nowiki>
</pre>
==== Example ====
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="height:32px;width: 80%; background:#C787C7; margin-left: 10%; margin-right: 10%; float: center; text-align:center;" style="border:none; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=candidate-for-moving-left.png); background-position:left; width:13px;">
| <style="border:none;  width=100%;"> '''Candidate for Moving:''' This article may not be appropriate for this wiki, and should be moved to the Team wiki.
| <style="border:none; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=candidate-for-moving-right.png); background-repeat:no-repeat; background-position:right; width:13px;">
|}

=== Candidate for deletion ===

==== Usage ====

* Pages which cover subjects which are inappropriate for the Help wiki. These might include:
** Spam or advertising material.
** Links to malicious files or other unsavoury websites.
* Pages which are useless to all Ubuntu users.
* Import this code in page:
 <pre>
<nowiki>[[Include(DocumentationTeam/WikiBanners/CandidateForDeletion)]]</nowiki>
</pre>
==== Example ====
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="height:32px;width: 80%; background:#FDC0A4; margin-left: 10%; margin-right: 10%; float: center; text-align:center;" style="border:none; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=candidate-for-deletion-left.png); background-position:left; width:13px;">
| <style="border:none;  width=100%;">  '''Candidate for Deletion:''' This article may not be appropriate for this wiki, and may be deleted.
| <style="border:none; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=candidate-for-deletion-right.png); background-repeat:no-repeat; background-position:right; width:13px;">
|}

=== Duplicate article ===

==== Usage ====

'''Note:''' When adding this to a page, make sure that you include a comment with a link to the page you suspect that it is a duplicate of.

* Pages which cover the same material as another page.
* Pages which cover a subset of the material of another page.
* Import this code in page:
 <pre>
<nowiki>[[Include(DocumentationTeam/WikiBanners/DuplicateArticle)]]</nowiki>
</pre>
==== Example ====
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="height:32px;width: 80%; background:#e6e6e6; margin-left: 10%; margin-right: 10%; float: center; text-align:center;" style="border:none; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=duplicate-article-left.png); background-position:left; width:13px;">
| <style="border:none;  width=100%;">'''Duplicate Article:''' This article covers the same material as another article.
| <style="border:none; background-image:url(http://wiki.ubuntu.com/LeoIannacone/Test?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=duplicate-article-right.png); background-repeat:no-repeat; background-position:right; width:13px;">
|}
